# Read CSV
```{r}
csvData <- read.csv("../data/iris.csv")
head(csvData)
```

# Write CSV
```{r}
write.csv(csvData, "../data/irisWrite.csv")
csvWriteData = read.csv("../data/irisWrite.csv")
head(csvWriteData)
```

# Read Large Data
```{r}
initData = read.csv("../data/iris.csv", nrow=100)
classInfo = sapply(initData, class)
classInfo
allData = read.csv("../data/iris.csv", colClasses=classInfo)
```

# Textual Format
```{r error=TRUE}
dput(csvData, "../data/iris.R")
dgetData = dget("../data/iris.R")
head(dgetData)
dump("csvData", file="../data/irisDump.R")
rm(csvData)
head(csvData)  # Error
source("../data/irisDump.R")
head(csvData)
```

# Read Data by Connection
```{r}
con <- file("../data/iris.csv", "r")
csvData <- read.csv(con)
close(con)
head(csvData)
con <- file("../data/iris.csv", "r")
csvData <- readLines(con)
close(con)
head(csvData)
con <- url("http://www.kaist.ac.kr", "r")
urlData <- readLines(con, 6)
close(con)
head(urlData)
```
